title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Code Llama, and other LLMs runnable via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI with chat history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Browser extension that adds Ollama-powered GitHub Copilot-like suggestions in any textarea.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot template wired to Ollama via ollama-js.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; mentions or DM trigger.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; tokio & serde based.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with streaming chat, dependency injection helpers, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) ready to import.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that delegates service tasks to Ollama for local LLM processing in BPMN.
